organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: A glossary and definition of unified power flow controller (UPFC) related areas, including the structure, equipment, control and protection, test, and maintenance utilized by UPFC are specified in this guide. The guide is applicable in flexible ac transmission system (FACTS) such as UPFC, static synchronous compensator (STATCOM), and static synchronous series compensator (SSSC).
